temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.content:
• Optimal growth at 37 째C
  • Susceptible to moist heat: physical inactivation at 121 째C for 15 min and dry heat: 160-170 째C for at least 1 hour.
  • It can survive for weeks at low temperatures in different substrates such as: water, soil, forage, grain dust and decaying organic matter such as carcasses and hides.
  • Infected rabbit meat stored frozen at -15째 C has remained infective longer than 3 years.

oxygen.title: Oxygen
oxygen.content: Francisella tularensis is an aerobe bacterium. Optimal oxygen concentration for growth: 5% CO2
